original_title: The Doctors: The Colin Baker Years
overview: This is the definitive set of interviews with the team who brought the Colin Baker era of Doctor Who to life!  This documentary includes the best in-depth interviews with Colin Baker (the Sixth Doctor), Nicola Bryant (Peri), Bonnie Langford (Mel), Michael Jayston (The Valeyard), John Nathan-Turner (Producer) and Eric Saward (Script Editor) ever undertaken!
tagline: Meet the stars from TVâ€™s top Science Fiction series!
title: The Doctors: The Colin Baker Years
